#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int reverse(int num);

int main(){
	int testCases,data1,data2,reverseSum,caseCounter = 0;
	cin>>testCases;
	int result[testCases];
	while(caseCounter<testCases){
		cin>>data1;
		cin>>data2;
		data1  = reverse(data1);
		//cout <<" Data 1 : "<<data1;
		data2  = reverse(data2);
		//cout <<" Data 2 : "<<data2;
		reverseSum  = data1+data2;
		//cout<<"Sum : "<<reverseSum<<endl;
		reverseSum  = reverse(reverseSum);
	
		result[caseCounter]= reverseSum;
		caseCounter ++;		 
	}
	for (int i=0;i<testCases;i++){
		cout<<result[i]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
	
} 
int reverse( int num){
	int temp=num,numOfTerms=0;
	
	while(temp%10==0)
	temp = temp/10;
	
	while(num/pow(10,numOfTerms)>=1)
	numOfTerms++;
	
//	cout<<"Number of Terms : "<<numOfTerms<<endl;
	if(numOfTerms==1){
		return num;
	}
	else{
	int digits[numOfTerms];
	temp = num;
	for(int counter = numOfTerms-1;counter>=0;counter--){
		digits[counter] = temp%10;
		//cout<<digits[counter]<<endl;
		temp = temp/10;
		
	}
	temp = 0;
	int cond;
	numOfTerms%2==0?cond=numOfTerms/2-1:cond=(numOfTerms-1)/2;
	for(int i =0;i<=cond;i++){
		temp = digits[i];
		digits[i] = digits[numOfTerms-1-i];
		digits[numOfTerms-1-i] =temp;
	}
	int number=0;
	for(int i=numOfTerms-1;i>=0;i--){
		number = number+digits[i]*pow(10,numOfTerms-1-i);
		//cout<<number<<endl;
	}
	return number;
	}
}
